extendedInfo.description: Get breaking news, weather and traffic alerts from southeast Wisconsin wherever you are with TODAY'S TMJ4 app. WTMJ TV's app offers extensive coverage of the stories that matter most from Channel 4 in Milwaukee. From Daybreak with Vince Vitrano and Susan Kim, to Live at 10 p.m. with Mike Jacobs and Carole Meekins, our app provides you Wisconsin news throughout the day powered by tmj4.com. App features include: -The latest weather forecast from your Storm Team 4 from Chief Meteorologist John Malan, Scott Steele, Brian Gotter, Michael Fish and Jesse Ritka -Local and state politics and government, including updates from Madison -Sports information on your favorite teams, including the Green Bay Packers, the Milwaukee Brewers, the Milwaukee Bucks, the Marquette Golden Eagles and the Wisconsin Badgers -Your iContribute photos, including Scott Steele's Pet pics and your favorite local sports teams -News, sports and weather photos -Videos from our latest newscasts, as well as web exclusive videos -Traffic updates for your commute -All Dirty Dining, Call 4 Action, Special Assignment, Positively Milwaukee, I-Team and 4 Your Health segments -Station contests and promotions -School closings -An easy way to listen to our partner, AM 620 WTMJ -A way to submit your story or photo to our station via iContribute Plus, you can easily share this content and connect to your friends and family using the Facebook feature on our app!

reviews.title: Finally fixed! On Galaxy Note 2
reviews.comment: The news scrolls and opens again like it used to.   Thank you!  Love this app for getting my news.
reviews.author: Mark Schorer

reviews.title: Need sports other then packet news
reviews.comment: Hey I\'m a fan of the packers but I also like the brewers and racing and there is no link for any sports other then the packers and it just gets sickening hearing about rodgers every breath seriously there are other sports teams in this state
reviews.author: Noel Patrick

reviews.title: Its great
reviews.comment: A LOT OF GOOD NEWS, ITS LIKE NEWS, ON YOUR PHONE. MOBILE NEWS. NEWS NEEDS MORE NEWS BUT AS FAR AS NEWS GOES IT SURE DOES HAVE A LOT OF NEWS TO SHARE, AND THATS GREAT NEWS.
reviews.author: Elle Williams

reviews.title: Hope you like football!
reviews.comment: No, seriously. If you\'re not a football fan, ignore this app.
reviews.author: Jay Duncan

reviews.comment: Good app, no problems with it
reviews.author: Sandy D

reviews.title: Great news source
reviews.comment: This app is very user friendly and gets me the news, weather and scores in seconds.
reviews.author: Tanya Taylor

reviews.title: Won\'t Refresh & No Support Response
reviews.comment: The news feed regularly won\'t refresh, even when I manually force it to.  It\'ll still show no articles newer than several days ago.  Sent emails to support, but have heard absolutely nothing, not even an automated reply indicating they received my message.
reviews.author: Dustin Maass

reviews.title: Streaming. Never. Works
reviews.comment: Live. Broadcast. Haha. Never Works. Always unable connect server....ridiculous. ..
reviews.author: LR KOSS

reviews.title: Weather portion is now a disappointment
reviews.comment: Weather is very hard to maneuver through more. Change back to old format. Using weather channel now!

reviews.title: Good app awesome content
reviews.comment: I believe the weather radar map is unmatched in its pinpoint accuracy.

reviews.title: Good app
